channel.title: The Classic Metal Show Best Of Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hail And Kill!
channel.itunes:author: The Classic Metal Show
channel.itunes:summary: The Classic Metal Show is a 6-hour, all live request show which features the best in "Classic Metal". The show features many great features, including interviews with all the biggest stars in Classic Metal. Hosted by Neeley and Chris Akin, the show has been broadcasting since January of 1996 and grows stronger with each passing week. Check out THE CLASSIC METAL SHOW Saturdays from 9pm to 3am EST on The CMS Radio Network, as well as our fine affiliates! Our website is www.theclassicmetalshow.com. The Classic Metal Show launched a 24-7 Online Classic Metal Radio Station - www.cmsradionetwork.com. This hard rock, heavy metal, classic metal, hard rock show has featured interviews, talking metal and music from bands such as Dokken, Motley Crue, Queensryche, Slayer, Metallica, Hellfueled, Astral Doors, Tarsha, Megadeth, Lizzie Borden, Metal Church, Quiet Riot, Poison, Warrant, Def Leppard, Death Angel, Dark Angel, Seven Witches, Testament, Seven Wishes, Kick Axe, Fastway, Yngwie Malmsteen, Beatallica, Grave Digger, Manowar, Sword, 40 Ft. Ringo, Accept, AC/DC, Adriangale, Aerosmith, Alcatrazz, Aldo Nova, Alice Cooper, American Angel, American Dog, American Pearl, Anthrax, Anvil, Arcade, Armored Saint, Axel Rudi Pell, Badlands, Bar7, channel.description: Airs live from 9pm-3am EST exclusively at www.theclassicmetalshow.com, and on terrestrial radio.
